code: @Override public void service(ServletRequest request, ServletResponse response) throws ServletException, IOException {     String content = "Hello World".     if (this.echoRequestInfo) {         content += " scheme=" + request.getScheme().         content += " remoteaddr=" + request.getRemoteAddr().     }     if (this.writeWithoutContentLength) {         response.setContentType("text/plain").         ServletOutputStream outputStream = response.getOutputStream().         StreamUtils.copy(content.getBytes(), outputStream).         outputStream.flush().     } else {         response.getWriter().write(content).     } }
